job_title: Research and Wellness Department in Springfield, MA
pros: Senior management concerned with quality improvement of the clinic and employee job satisfaction, respect it's employees. Brand new facility. Management at the Research and Wellness Department is wonderful, very understanding and flexible with work/life balance. Wonderful sick time and health/dental insurance employee benefits. Wide variety of training available to staff.
cons: Raises frozen due to outstanding debt on the new facility.

review_title: Community Health Center is always Helpful
pros: Good customer service.  Great location to assist community.  Opening a new building soon!  Management understands its workers and what everyday life adds to the picture.  Great people to work with.
cons: Small.  Needs more marketing for the city to notice.  Tornado damage to one of our buildings slowed the process of the new building construction.

Workload for providers is overwhelming due to lack of consistent support staff and work flow,
Authoritative management style,  management disregards feedback or new ideas to improve work environments.  High turnover, lack of respect from management, no room for advancement.  Work many hours from home, poor work life balance.

pros: Good hours.  Reasonable, understanding and supportive for most things.  Great team of coworkers
cons: Patient population and demands. Recent freeze on raises and hold on providers taking vacation time

pros: Amazing team, Great support to the community and amazing support to the staff
